vlive.korean: [전투적인 마인드를 지녔지만] 우리가 간다 이런 거? [A combat mind] Like, "here we come". 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 닥터(겸 신인가수) 박지민선생님 존재가 이미 만병통치 불로장생 명약이네요💊 (JIMIN doing a situation play)
뭐 되게 전투적으로 된다고 해야 하나? it feels like we're getting ready to go into combat. 듣기 View video BTS : 저 왔어요~!😉
vlive.english: it feels like we're getting ready to go into combat.

vlive.korean: 뭐라고 해야 되지? 뭔가 사람이 되게 전투적으로 된다고 해야 되나? how should I put this? Should I say we get into our fierce modes? 듣기 View video BTS : 저 왔어요~!😉
vlive.english: how should I put this? Should I say we get into our fierce modes?

vlive.korean: [전투 준비] - 나 맨날 같은거 내는데 - 연습게임? I always take out the same ones... - Practice game? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 6화
vlive.english: I always take out the same ones... - Practice game?

vlive.korean: 반지며 이거이며 - 나는 왜 저 노래도 저렇게 전투적이었지? Rings... - Why did I look so aggressive in that song? 듣기 View video T-ARA : 티아라 10살 축하해🎉 10th Anniversary!👑
vlive.english: Rings... - Why did I look so aggressive in that song?
